Apman > Bookings >

Generate A Buy LEPO Penloader Booking

Penloader is the file format used to upload trades into GIM II

All APPROVED Sell Asset / Buy LEPO transactions are included in the Buy Lepo File

Given

Transaction Type State Sedol Executed Quantity Executed Price Settlement Date Trade Date
Sell Asset / Buy LEPO APPROVED 4031976 500 25 2011-06-07 2011-02-14
Sell Asset / Buy LEPO APPROVED 5756029 700 50 2011-07-07 2011-03-14

Then

Spreadsheet with the same data as Example Buy LEPO file is generated
